subject: Basketball
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
lead_paragraph: In Rose’s hometown of Chicago, he was already known as someone with a social conscience even before he donned the “I Can’t Breathe” T-shirt, setting the stage for other N.B.A. players to do so.
